Quick search

extrct_out¶

clustertools.util.output.extrct_out(cluster, fileout, projected=False)[source]¶

NAME:

extrct_out

PURPOSE:

Extrct key cluster properties and write to file –> N, Nbinary, trh, mtot, rlagrange_1-10, rmpro, rhpro, rv, rl, rt, rvmax, vmax

INPUT:

cluster - a StarCluster-class object

fileout - opened file to write data to

OUTPUT:

None

HISTORY:

2018 - Written - Webb (UofT)
